## Developer Guide

If you are new to using `nbdev` here are some useful pointers to get you
started.

### Install my_blog in Development mode

``` sh
# make sure my_blog package is installed in development mode
$ pip install -e .

# make changes under nbs/ directory
# ...

# compile to have changes apply to my_blog
$ nbdev_prepare
```

## Usage

### Installation

Install latest from the GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/fromLittleAcorns/my-blog):

``` sh
$ pip install git+https://github.com/fromLittleAcorns/my-blog.git
```

or from [conda](https://anaconda.org/fromLittleAcorns/my-blog)

``` sh
$ conda install -c fromLittleAcorns my_blog
```

or from [pypi](https://pypi.org/project/my-blog/)

``` sh
$ pip install my_blog
```

### Documentation

Documentation can be found hosted on this GitHub
[repository](https://github.com/fromLittleAcorns/my-blog)’s
[pages](https://fromLittleAcorns.github.io/my-blog/). Additionally you
can find package manager specific guidelines on
[conda](https://anaconda.org/fromLittleAcorns/my-blog) and
[pypi](https://pypi.org/project/my-blog/) respectively.
